Articles.Content:
So I had this idea for a game when I realized I had no idea what my post count was!

Here's how it works:

When you post, guess how many post you have! This works on the honor system, so no looking at your post count beforehand!

I'll start: Hmm, I think 1,300.

And I have none. That's right, I'm the spirit of the forum games. I've never posted anywhere but forum games.

Have fun!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-11T00:44:19Z" title="07/11/2015 12:44  AM" data-short="9 yr">July 11, 2015</time> by Mad Rocket Scientist**

I'd say 3000 for sure ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Or do u mean only marked posts? Theres nothing to guess as i can't look away from the post count...

889 is my guess.

Well I should have used my first guess of 789.
If I remember right, I broke 800 a few posts ago.

> 
> I'd say 3000 for sure ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> Or do u mean only marked posts? Theres nothing to guess as i can't look away from the post count...

I don't quite know what you mean, I mean the little post counter in your avatar spot. Every time I try to mention my post count, I realize I have no idea how many posts I have.

Oh god this is gonna be hard.

885? Or 845? One of the two

> 
> Oh god this is gonna be hard.
> 885? Or 845? One of the two

Nope.

471?

Maybe?

EDIT: OHHH, I was ONE OFF!!!!

![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif):cool:
